attributes.action: take immediate steps to remove all forms of foreign and overseas governance in the UK and to assume a similar position to Norway with respect to the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of this nation have at no time been consulted about any step towards creating the European Super State.  All the evidence available demonstrates its effect is entirely harmful to the UK.  Our fish stocks, for example, are under the control of the Spanish and have been decimated.  Our fishermen have little access and this is a food resource of strategic significance.

Despite propaganda claims our trade with Europe is not beneficial.  We run a massive trade deficit with Europe even before counting the cost of our membership fees.
